txt.en: While searching Thornhope for survivors, you discovered that the Orcs there came from many different tribes, from Moria, Mordor, and Isengard.\n\nYou should defeat some of the Orcs.
While searching Thornhope for survivors, you discovered that the Orcs there came from many different tribes, from Moria, Mordor, and Isengard.
Orcs may be found within the ruins of Thornhope in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should defeat as many Orcs as you can to help satisfy BÃ©ortnoth's desire for revenge.
